mention.text: Central Bulletin TRAFFIC ACCIDENT NEAR ELODIS 2007/04/11 ABILA , Kronos
the result of driver error on the part of the Elodisian driver
A government investigation has concluded a traffic accident involving a GAStech International vehicle and the vehicle of a family from Elodis resulting in the deaths of the four family members
